Democrats should support compliance assistance measures like the Voluntary Protection Program rather than job killing regulations like OSHA's upcoming Temporary Emergency Standard. (4/4)

My Voluntary Protection Program (VPP) Act would authorize the VPP, which focuses on compliance assistance for employers w/ a demonstrated commitment to workforce safety & health. Companies participating in VPP are exempt from OSHA fines & can avoid numerous OSHA headaches. (3/4)
If Democrats really cared about workers they would have gone forward with their oversight hearing and asked how OSHA plans to help employers comply with their ridiculous new regulation. (2/4)

The Democrats postponed today‚Äôs workforce safety oversight hearing after the Biden Administration advanced a Temporary Emergency Standard, demonstrating that Democrats care more about introducing excessive job killing regulations than protecting workers. (1/4)
